lyrics.text:
’Eiki ke fakamānava
Hoku laumālie
‘Aki ‘a e ‘ofa ‘a’au
Na’e fakalilo.

Mo ke tali pehe ‘Eiki,
‘Eku kole lahi,
“Ko ia ‘oku ke kole,
Ko ia pē ‘e fai.”

Ka ko e me’a mo’oni
Pea te u mafeia,
Te u mo’ui, pea ‘ikai
Toe angahala?

Sīsū kapau te u lava’i,
Ki he ‘Afiona,
‘E hoko mo ‘eku tui,
‘A hono mafeia.

Ke ke tuku kiate au,
‘A e tui tapu,
‘A ia ‘oku hiki atu,
‘A e fu’u mo’unga.

Pea ‘e fakahā atu
‘A ‘eku mo’ui,
Hono mālohi totonu
‘O e anga ‘ofa.
